head.supplied: ¶ I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of your letter of the 7th June and in reply to inform you that the chief Secretary will receive the Deputation from the Health Committee of the Melbourne...

div.p: From John Moore to Town Clerk
B2636, unit 7, VPRS 1187/P outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of your letter of the 7th June and in reply to inform you that the chief Secretary will receive the Deputation from the Health Committee of the Melbourne Town Council on the subject of incorporating tht peice of land formerly used as a Zoological Garden with the Town Park, on tuesday next at half past 12 o clock.
